English: Gains Swiftness and cost is reduced by 2 when bonus damage is at maximum.

Cost reduced by 1. 
Draw 1 skill. 
1 more potion can be used this combat.
Heal all allies for &h (55%). Deal &d (40% of healing power) damage to targeted enemy for every other active ally buff (rounded up) plus each unique debuff the target has.
Gains Swiftness if potion was used this battle.
Block any Debuffs that were not resisted for 1 turn.
If an Ally has taken direct (non-Pain) damage this turn, increase cost by 1 and crit chance by 60%.
In battle, if this skill is fixed, reduce its cost by 2.
Increase crit chance by 100% if user has Lunar Curtain buff.
